sample_options.name: Sample options
sample_options.description: Parameters relating to the sample being analysed.

gene_bed.name: BED
gene_bed.description: BED file containing gene intervals. This will be created from the GTF file if not specified.

transcript_fasta.name: Transcript FASTA
transcript_fasta.description: FASTA transcriptome file - generated from the main FASTA if not provided.

star_index.name: STAR Index
star_index.description: A genome index built with STAR.

rsem_index.name: RSEM Index
rsem_index.description: A genome index built with RSEM.

hisat2_index.name: HISAT2 Index
hisat2_index.description: A genome index built with HISAT2.

salmon_index.name: Salmon Index
salmon_index.description: A genome index built with Salmon.

skip_umi_extract.name: Skip UMI Extraction
skip_umi_extract.description: Skip the UMI extraction from the read in case the UMIs have been moved to the headers in advance of the pipeline run.

umitools_extract_method.name: Type of UMI pattern
umitools_extract_method.description: UMI pattern to use. Can be either 'string' (default) or 'regex'.

umitools_dedup_stats.name: UMI Tools dedupe stats
umitools_dedup_stats.description: Generate output stats when running 'umi_tools dedup'.

umitools_bc_pattern.name: UMI Tools read 1 barcode pattern
umitools_bc_pattern.description: The UMI barcode pattern to use if the UMI is on read 1 e.g. 'NNNNNN' indicates that the first 6 nucleotides of the read are from the UMI.

umitools_bc_pattern2.name: UMI Tools read 2 barcode pattern
umitools_bc_pattern2.description: The UMI barcode pattern to use if the UMI is on read 2 e.g. 'NNNNNN' indicates that the first 6 nucleotides of the read are from the UMI.

umi_discard_read.name: Discard reads
umi_discard_read.description: After UMI barcode extraction discard either R1 or R2 by setting this parameter to 1 or 2, respectively.

save_umi_intermeds.name: Save UMI Tools intermediates
save_umi_intermeds.description: If this option is specified, intermediate FastQ and BAM files produced by UMI-tools are also saved in the results directory.

read_trimming_options.name: Read Trimming Settings
read_trimming_options.description: Settings to control read quality and adaptor trimming

clip_r1.name: 5' clip read 1
clip_r1.description: Instructs Trim Galore to remove bp from the 5' end of read 1 (or single-end reads).

clip_r2.name: 5' clip read 2
clip_r2.description: Instructs Trim Galore to remove bp from the 5' end of read 2 (paired-end reads only).

three_prime_clip_r1.name: 3' clip read 1
three_prime_clip_r1.description: Instructs Trim Galore to remove bp from the 3' end of read 1 AFTER adapter/quality trimming has been performed.

three_prime_clip_r2.name: 3' clip read 2
three_prime_clip_r2.description: Instructs Trim Galore to remove bp from the 3' end of read 2 AFTER adapter/quality trimming has been performed.

trim_nextseq.name: Nextseq quality trimming
trim_nextseq.description: Instructs Trim Galore to apply the --nextseq=X option, to trim based on quality, but ignoring the high quality G's. Input is the threshold PHRED score for quality trimming (eg. 20). See https://cutadapt.readthedocs.io/en/stable/guide.html#nextseq-trim for more details.

min_trimmed_reads.name: Minimum trimmed reads
min_trimmed_reads.description: Minimum number of trimmed reads below which samples are removed from further processing. Some downstream steps in the pipeline will fail if this threshold is too low.

save_trimmed.name: Save trimmed
save_trimmed.description: Save the trimmed FastQ files in the results directory.

alignment_options.name: Alignment Settings
alignment_options.description: Settings to control alignment algorithms and quantification.

aligner.name: Aligner
aligner.description: Specifies the alignment algorithm to use - available options are 'star_salmon', 'star_rsem' and 'hisat2'.

pseudo_aligner.name: Pseudo-aligner
pseudo_aligner.description: Specifies the pseudo-aligner to use - available options are 'salmon'. Runs in addition to '--aligner'.

bam_csi_index.name: CSI index
bam_csi_index.description: Create a CSI index for BAM files instead of the traditional BAI index. This will be required for genomes with larger chromosome sizes.

star_ignore_sjdbgtf.name: STAR ignore sjdbgtf
star_ignore_sjdbgtf.description: When using pre-built STAR indices do not re-extract and use splice junctions from the GTF file.

salmon_quant_libtype.name: Salmon strandedness
salmon_quant_libtype.description: Override Salmon library type inferred based on strandedness defined in meta object.

min_mapped_reads.name: Minimum mapped reads (%)
min_mapped_reads.description: Minimum percentage of uniquely mapped reads below which samples are removed from further processing.

seq_center.name: Sequencing center
seq_center.description: Sequencing center information to be added to read group of BAM files.

stringtie_ignore_gtf.name: Stringtie
stringtie_ignore_gtf.description: Perform reference-guided de novo assembly of transcripts using StringTie i.e. dont restrict to those in GTF file.

extra_star_align_args.name: STAR arguments
extra_star_align_args.description: Extra arguments to pass to STAR alignment command in addition to defaults defined by the pipeline.

extra_salmon_quant_args.name: Salmon quant arguments
extra_salmon_quant_args.description: Extra arguments to pass to Salmon quant command in addition to defaults defined by the pipeline.

save_unaligned.name: Save unaligned reads
save_unaligned.description: Where possible, save unaligned reads from either STAR, HISAT2 or Salmon to the results directory.

save_align_intermeds.name: Save intermediate BAM
save_align_intermeds.description: Save the intermediate BAM files from the alignment step.

skip_alignment.name: Skip alignment
skip_alignment.description: Skip all of the alignment-based processes within the pipeline.

rseqc_modules.name: RSeQC
rseqc_modules.description: Specify the RSeQC modules to run. Default: 'bam_stat,inner_distance,infer_experiment,junction_annotation,junction_saturation,read_distribution,read_duplication'

deseq2_vst.name: DeSeq2 VST
deseq2_vst.description: Use vst transformation instead of rlog with DESeq2.

skip_biotype_qc.name: Skip biotype QC
skip_biotype_qc.description: Skip additional featureCounts process for biotype QC.

skip_deseq2_qc.name: Skip DeSeq2 QC
skip_deseq2_qc.description: Skip DESeq2 PCA and heatmap plotting.

skip_qc.name: Skip QC
skip_qc.description: Skip all QC steps except for MultiQC.

outputs.name: MultiQC report
outputs.description: Report aggregating all QC reporting including FastQC, alignment stats and DeSeq2 plots.

outputs.name: Normalised bigwig fwd
outputs.description: Genome-wide coverage bigwig to be viewed in genome browser. Contains reads mapping to fwd strand.

outputs.name: Normalised bigwig rev
outputs.description: Genome-wide coverage bigwig to be viewed in genome browser. Contains reads mapping to rev strand.

outputs.name: Salmon transcript TPM table
outputs.description: Table containing transcript per million (TPM) quantified transcripts per sample.

outputs.name: Salmon transcript raw counts for downstream analysis
outputs.description: RDS file containing transcript raw counts per sample.

outputs.name: Salmon gene TPM table
outputs.description: Table containing transcript per million (TPM) quantified genes per sample.

outputs.name: Salmon gene raw counts for DeSeq2
outputs.description: RDS file containing gene raw counts per sample.

outputs.name: RSEM counts
outputs.description: Tables containing gene and transcript counts per sample as quantified by RSEM.
